name: Where is the cake?
description:
A short game jam and also tribute for Komunitas Mangaka Indonesia's Battle Rally.
Made in less than 7 days with RPG Maker VX Ace.

A story about a living cake, and you must catch it.
Join the adventure of masked man and a neko? catching a cake that ran away!

An adventure puzzle game with comic style story telling and handmade assets.

Gameplay : 30 minutes

Edit : reupload file because missing font

Known Issue :

  • Lag, probably because of your pc (I'm sorry I can't do much in that case)
